    • Constructor Detail

      • TextureManager

        public TextureManager(Context context)
        Creates a new TextureManager with an initial capacity of 16.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.

      • TextureManager

        public TextureManager(int initialCapacityForTextures,
              int initialCapacityForTextureRegions,
              Context context)
        Creates a new TextureManager.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacityForTextures - Initial capacity for textures.
        initialCapacityForTextureRegions - Initial capacity for texture regions.
        context - Context.

    • Method Detail

      • addTextureRegion

        public TextureRegion addTextureRegion(String key,
                             TextureRegion textureRegion)
        Adds a TextureRegion to this TextureManager.
        The specified key can be used to retrieve that TextureRegion later. If there is already a TextureRegion registered with the specified key in this TextureManager, it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        key - Identifies the TextureRegion.
        textureRegion - TextureRegion.
        Returns:
        Returns the TextureRegion previously registered with this key, or null if there wasn't any.

      • removeTextureRegion

        public TextureRegion removeTextureRegion(String key)
        Removes the TextureRegion associated to the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        Returns:
        Removed TextureRegion or null

      • getTextureRegion

        public TextureRegion getTextureRegion(String key)
        Returns the TextureRegion associated to the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        Returns:
        TextureRegion or null

      • addTextureAtlas

        public void addTextureAtlas(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
        Adds all TextureRegions of the specified TextureAtlas to this TextureManager. The source texture of the specified TextureAtlas is also added to this TextureManager.
        Parameters:
        textureAtlas - TextureAtlas.

      • removeTextureAtlas

        public void removeTextureAtlas(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
        Removes all TextureRegions of the specified TextureAtlas from this TextureManager.
        The source texture of the specified TextureAtlas will not be removed from this TextureManager.
        Parameters:
        textureAtlas - TextureAtlas.

      • addTexture

        public boolean addTexture(Texture texture)
        Adds the specified Texture to this TextureManager.
        Parameters:
        texture - Texture.
        Returns:
        true if it has been added, false if a Texture with the same path (relative to the assets folder) was previously registered in this TextureManager

      • addFontTextures

        public void addFontTextures(Font font)
        Adds all textures of a Font to this TextureManager.
        Parameters:
        font - Font.

      • removeTexture

        public void removeTexture(Texture texture)
        Removes the specified Texture from the collection of active textures.
        The texture is moved to a pool so it won't be reloaded but the object will not be collected by the GC until clearRemovedTextures() is called.
        Parameters:
        texture - Texture to be removed from the collection of active textures.

      • removeAllTextures

        public void removeAllTextures()
        Removes all Textures from the collection of active textures.
        The textures are moved to a pool so they won't be reloaded but the objects will not be collected by the GC until clearRemovedTextures() is called.

      • clearRemovedTextures

        public void clearRemovedTextures()
        Removes all textures from the pool of removed textures. Active textures won't be removed.
        This method must be called from the rendering thread.
        See Also:
        removeTexture(Texture), removeAllTextures()

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Removes all textures stored in this TextureManager.
        This method must be called from the rendering thread.

      • loadTextures

        public void loadTextures()
        Loads all textures that have not been previously loaded.
        This method must be called from the rendering thread.

      • loadAllTextures

        public void loadAllTextures()
        Loads all textures.
        This method must be called from the rendering thread.
